There were no other sightings in Monroe on or around August 10th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi usually take photos at dusk and when i download them to my pc, i find lots of orbs\spheres in the photos. this time i thought i'd try to take some photos during the day with no flash. i went out several times, but no luck. the last time i went outside, i looked up in the sky and saw this white orb\sphere in the eastern sky. it was slowly moving north. i zoomed in and took one shot, and then adjusted my camera and took another. figuring i had two shots, i decided to just watch it. it moved north for a bit and then just disappeared into thin air. it did not disappear into a cloud. it just vanished. i came in and downloaded the photos and the one i zoomed in on didn't come out, but the other one did. i'm attaching it and also an enlargement and color contrast. i don't know what the object was, but i know it wasn't a plastic bag, a bird, or a helium balloon.
Summary: Watched white orb/sphere move through sky in daylight
